notes: Summary (by Craig Delich): "The murder of Jack Gillian by Gallows Gallagher mystifies Dr. McNider, who knows that Gallager is in State Prison. So the Man of Night busts Gallager out of prison and learns that he is in reality the brother of the criminal, and that the real Gallagher is in cahoots with the crooked warden of the prison."
